MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW6 and CW7 postcode areas of Tarporley and Winsford affecting properties in Rushton, Wettenhall and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and became aware of it at 7:05am. Our engineers have arrived on site to investigate reports of 3rd party damage to our network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible and we expect restoration restored by 9:15am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:37am on 5th March 2021.
